body_html: Ah, NVM, you guys changed the channel. I got the package when it was on the soumith channel. I still don't know why conda is not telling me that an update on the pytorch channel is available (when I don't specify which channel). The old conda I guess picked up some weird default channel, but that isn't showing anymore; no default channel is advised.

body: Ah, NVM, you guys changed the channel. I got the package when it was on the soumith channel. I still don't know why conda is not telling me that an update on the pytorch channel is available (when I don't specify which channel). The old conda I guess picked up some weird default channel, but that isn't showing anymore; no default channel is advised.
